1.text: Separate the pipette or dropper from the essential oil bottle.

2.text: Fill a large bowl with warm water and place the pipettes in it.

3.text: Let the pipettes sit in the water for roughly 30 minutes to release the oil.

4.text: Transfer the pipettes to a bowl full of warm, soapy water.

5.text: Swish the pipettes around in the water before rinsing them off.

6.text: Lay the pipettes on a clean towel so they dry.

7.text: Pop the rubber cap off of the pipette to separate the pieces.

8.text: Rinse the pieces under clean running water.

9.text: Fill a large clean bowl at least 1 in (2.5 cm) deep with Epsom salt.

10.text: Submerge the pipette and bottle in the salt fully.

11.text: Let the pieces sit for 24 hours so the salt absorbs the moisture.

12.text: Rinse the pipette and bottle off with clean, warm water.

13.text: Lay the pipette on an absorbent towel to dry completely.
